text: Show me the money!" 💰🧁💡 Infection Prevention and Antimicrobial Stewardship shouldn't be an afterthought, it's time to make it a priority! 🚀 Join me at the Society of Epidemiology of America in Houston, Texas, from April 16 to 19, 2024, to learn how to create a business plan that will convince the C-suite to invest in your program. Let's make sure our hospitals are safe and healthy for everyone! 🏥🧬
